# 0.46.0

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_rust",
    integrity = "sha256-F8U7+AC5MvMtPKGdLLnorVM84cDXKfDRgwd7/dq3rUY=",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/releases/download/0.46.0/rules_rust-v0.46.0.tar.gz"],
)
```

Additional documentation can be found at: https://bazelbuild.github.io/rules_rust/#setup


## What's Changed
* fix: default rustfmt version to supplied rust version by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2660
* Use repo-mapping-aware runfiles API in rust-analyzer by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2666
* Fix protobuf generated srcs to include all sources by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2676
* Fix cargo_build_script executables. by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2675
* crate_universe: Don't include crate name in build script path. by @criemen in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2663
* Ensure dynamic library dependencies end up in the runfiles directory by @EdSchouten in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2671
* use bazel_ci_rules bazel_dep instead of http_archive by @mmorel-35 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2678
* Ensure that running `bazel build` on a cargo_build_script target actually runs the build script by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2680
* Allow overriding crate universe packages to local packages by @ograff in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2674
* Depend on a copy of rustfmt for the target by @EdSchouten in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2685
* [Bugfix] Convert metadata keys to screaming snake case instead of screaming kebab case in `cargo_build_script_runner` by @Pagten in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2682
* Add support for override_target when using bzlmod by @AmeliasCode in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2683
* Release 0.46.0 by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2686

## New Contributors
* @mattem made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2660
* @EdSchouten made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2671
* @mmorel-35 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2678
* @ograff made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2674
* @Pagten made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2682

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/compare/0.45.1...0.46.0

## What's Changed
* Bzlmod-aware runfiles library by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2566
* Add clippy_flag flag to allow flags to be added in succession. by @granaghan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2625
* Add aspect_rules_js to MODULE.bazel by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2618
* Register a default rust toolchain. by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2624
* Nit: Fix link to example in rust_bindgen.md by @hauserx in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2628
* Add context to error messages by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2408
* Update `cargo_bootstrap_repository` interface to match dependency macros by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2630
* Added debug logging for spliced manifests to crate_universe by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2629
* also rewrite -isystem in addition to -sysroot by @adrianimboden in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2631
* Support loading http credentials from netrc by @golovasteek in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2623
* Updated Buildifier version for crate_universe by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2634
* Follow-up documentation/fixes to lockfile API by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2637
* Add docs and examples of complicated build scripts by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2635
* Added Rust 1.78.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2639
* Remove `incompatible_test_attr_crate_and_srcs_mutually_exclusive` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2641
* Minor cleanup for crate_universe by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2644
* Use `cargo tree` to determine feature dependent optional deps by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2636
* Release 0.43.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2642
* Update cross to fix crate_universe builds in releases by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2645

Additional documentation can be found at: https://bazelbuild.github.io/rules_rust/#setup


## What's Changed
* Switch from `sha256` to `integrity` in release notes by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2389
* Support third party crates with bzlmod by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1910
* Replaced multiple usages of `String` with `Label`. by @rickvanprim in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2363
* Fix missing .wasm output for rust_wasm_bindgen by @alexkirsz in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2396
* Stringify annotation labels by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2394
* Fix name of toolchain repo by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2395
* Advertise CcInfo provider on rules by @cameron-martin in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2126
* Add test for query and cquery in the repo by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2398
* Change default Rust distribution downloads from .tar.gz to .tar.xz by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2399
* Add annotation support for transient crates. by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2392
* Allow `RustBindgen` action to get `--gcc-toolchain` from cc toolchains by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2400
* Minor cleanup of prost rules by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2397
* Fix the patch_tool annotation. by @matts1 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2404
* Fix #2402: use `get_lib_name_default(lib)` instead of `lib.owner.name`. by @thb-sb in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2405
* Fix #2406: use codegen option `link-args` to forward `user_link_flags` in bindgen. by @thb-sb in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2407
* Nix Example updated `rules_nixpkgs` version and removed CI workaround. by @rickvanprim in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2409
* Prep for 0.37.0 by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2403
* Use # not / as a sed escape character by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2412
* Drop import macro by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2411
* Fix rustfmt toolchains when consuming rules_rust with bzlmod. by @jondo2010 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2410
* Provide a better error message when trying to generate rust-project.json by @jondo2010 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2196
* Update android example to use Starlark version of android_ndk_repository by @daivinhtran in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2417
* Allow ~ in repository names by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2427
* Prepare rust rules for Starlark CcToolchainInfo. by @buildbreaker2021 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2424
* Update rules_apple by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2436
* Prep 0.38.0 release by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2437

## New Contributors

## What's Changed
* Update using_cxx example to cxx 1.0.109 by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2200

* Add Android Platforms build flags. by @katre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2198
* Refactor rustc_compile_action to construct CrateInfo internally by @daivinhtran in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2188
* Remove _rustc_env_attr from CrateInfo by @daivinhtran in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2189
* Migrade rbe_ubuntu1604 to rbe_ubuntu2004 by @coeuvre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2208
* add compile_data attr to cargo_build_script by @krasimirgg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2203
* Prep release 0.29.1 by @krasimirgg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2209

## What's Changed
* rustdoc: respect error_format config by @goffrie in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2166
* Set up default allocator_library and global_allocator_library  by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2172
* Add `toolchain` parameter to the affected actions  by @kotlaja in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2140
* Make more annotations select-able by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2180
* Disable Bzlmod explicitly in .bazelrc by @meteorcloudy in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2182
* Refactor CrateInfo construction by @daivinhtran in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2161
* Simplify CPU arch detection in get_host_triple by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2183
* Added Rust 1.73.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2184
* Disable frequently failing Windows CI by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2187
* Add target_compatible_with from kwargs to build_script_kwargs by @daivinhtran in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2133
* Set CARGO_MANIFEST_LINKS if links is set by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2190
* Use canonical labels for analysistest config_settings by @nickgooding in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2191
* [prost] Fix handling of message names with acronyms by @william-smith-skydio in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2193
* [prost] Handle argfiles by @william-smith-skydio in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2194
* Improvements to better support cxx by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2192
* Prep release 0.29.0 by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2197

## What's Changed
* Remove cfg exec from link_deps attribute by @kalcutter in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2148
* Bump min Bazel version to 6.3 by @scentini in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2150
* Remove usage of grep_includes by @kotlaja in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2072
* Added github action to publish cargo-bazel binaries. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2134
* Add missing comma in nightly's example in index.md by @dayfine in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2151
* cargo_build_scripts can be run from custom directories by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2152
* Handle files from external repos (fix breaking change in Bazel 3.7.0) by @jgsogo in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2138
* Fix prost documentation errors by @joelwachsler in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2093
* Use cc_toolchain.linker_files() for files required at linking steps by @daivinhtran in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2165
* Added Rust 1.72.1 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2163
* Export bindgen rules through `@rules_rust//bindgen:defs.bzl` by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2054
* Revert "Flip experimental_use_coverage_metadata_files" by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2164
* Release 0.28.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2167

## What's Changed
* Add `experimental_symlink_execroot` for `cargo_build_script`. by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2085
* Fix doc for proc_macro_deps attr by @daivinhtran in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2095
* Fix typo in rust_proto documentation by @ryanpbrewster in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2099
* Make proc macros' "data" available in compile_data of crates that use macro by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2097
* Update platforms by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2111
* Option to generate extra targets with crate_universe by @adsnaider in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2103
* Remove `mandatory = True` from the `prost_plugin_flag` attribute in `rust_prost_toolchain`. by @thb-sb in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2110
* Cleanup args construction by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2122
* Add crate_name attribute by @daivinhtran in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2118
* Make @using_cxx example buildable on Windows by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2114
* Fix rust_doc_test dependency to allow either rust_library or cc_library by @HackAttack in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2112
* Read default annotation values from package's Cargo.toml metadata by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2124
* Fill in some crate metadata for publishing cargo-bazel to crates.io by @dtolnay in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2132
* Add TemplateVariableInfo for build script toolchains attribute. by @granaghan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2123
* Fix a typo in the `rust_proto` documentation. by @thb-sb in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2109
* Flip experimental_use_coverage_metadata_files by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2128
* Added Rust 1.72.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2127
* crate_universe: Allow platform-specific build script env vars by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2139
* Update rules_apple by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2137
* Release 0.27.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2130

## What's Changed
* Have the prost process wrapper print warnings to stderr by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2053
* Enable rustfmt in bindgen toolchains by default by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2055
* Removed legacy `//proto:*.bzl` files and updated docs by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2057
* Improve handling of build.rs link dependencies by @coffinmatician in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1970
* Add `opt_level` argument to `rust_repository_set`. by @konkers in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2036
* Update dependencies versions by @rickvanprim in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2064
* Updated wasm-bindgen dependencies by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2066
* Update rust_analyzer dependencies by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2065
* Updated crate_universe dependencies by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2063
* Disable zig cross compiling example by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2081
* Added Rust 1.71.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2062
* Add a clang-format check in CI by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2077
* Remove cfg exec from linker_scripts attribute. by @granaghan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2070
* Add support for split_coverage_post_processing by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2000
* Remove unnecessary eval to fix PATH variables containing a space by @belak in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2087
* Release 0.26.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2083

## What's Changed
* Allow sysroots from cc_toolchains to be added to bindgen actions by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2024

* Fix flaky coverage test in CI by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2028
* Re-enable zig example on CI by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2030
* fix: `crate_type` more accurately corresponds to CC linking actions by @rickvanprim in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/1975
* Add Prost and Tonic rules. by @freeformstu in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2033
* Release 0.25.0 by @freeformstu in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_rust/pull/2042
